name: Luora
0:
”Alexa, set my Chroma to red”
”Alexa, set my Chroma to steady”
”Alexa, turn off my Chroma”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control all your Luora's smart home devices! You can turn on or off and pattern your devices simply by giving orders to Alexa. Alexa can show you the stream from supported devices.

1)Download “Luora” app from Google Play Store or Apple App Store. 2)Sign up or sign in with your Luora account. 3)Setup the device with your “Luora” app, and make sure you can control it in the app. 4)Open Alexa app, search “Luora” skill and enable it by signing in your Luora account. 5)After the setup is finished, you can control the device with Alexa. Luora devices compatible with Alexa: Solo, Chroma Light, Duo. Connect your Luora with the Alexa to control your devices with direct actions and voice commands. You can control Luora devices(example: Christmas tree is the name of the light in Luora app) in your house by voice as following:
Alexa, turn on/off my Christmas tree.
Alexa, set my Christmas tree to red(bule/green/yellow….etc.).
Alexa, set my Christmas tree to steady(sparkle/fade/twinkle….etc.).
Alexa, set brightness my Christmas tree to Low(High)

Any problems, please contact us at luora2023@gmail.com
